comment: The GOA got it exactly backwards . Here s what they said . The law does not permit the President to substitute his own policy priorities to those Congress has enacted into law . It s exactly the opposite . The Constitution does not allow Congress to substitute its own priorities ...
amr:
# ::snt The GOA got it exactly backwards . Here s what they said . The law does not permit the President to substitute his own policy priorities to those Congress has enacted into law . It s exactly the opposite . The Constitution does not allow Congress to substitute its own priorities ...
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (g / get-05
            :ARG0 (g2 / government-organization
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 " GOA"))
            :ARG1 (ii / it)
            :ARG2 (b / backwards
                  :mod (e / exact)))
      :snt2 (s / say-01
            :ARG0 (t / they)
            :ARG1 (t2 / thing
                  :location (h / here)))
      :snt3 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (p / permit-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (l / law)
                  :ARG1 (s2 / substitute-01
                        :ARG0 (p2 / person
                              :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG2 (p3 / president)))
                        :ARG1 (p4 / priority
                              :mod (p5 / policy-01)
                              :poss p2)
                        :ARG2 (p6 / priority
                              :mod (t3 / that)
                              :ARG1-of (e2 / enact-01
                                    :ARG0 (g3 / government-organization
                                          :name (n2 / name
                                                :op1 "Congress"))
                                    :prep-into (l2 / law)))))
            :ARG2 (p7 / permit-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (l3 / law)
                  :ARG1 (s3 / substitute-01
                        :ARG0 g3
                        :ARG1 (p8 / priority
                              :poss g3
                              :ARG2-of s3))))
      :snt4 (a / allow-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (l4 / law
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "Constitution"))
            :ARG1 (s4 / substitute-01
                  :ARG0 (g4 / government-organization
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "Congress"))
                  :ARG1 (p9 / priority
                        :poss g4))))
